original_title: サラリーマンどんと節 気楽な稼業と来たもんだ
overview: The salaryman is the object of admiration in the world. Because there is no more carefree job than this, this cheerful song comedy is set to the hit melody of Ueki etc. [Selection of Actors and Directors].
title: Sarari man donto bushi - Kiraku na kagyô to kita monda
